mapper.update: update file_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lre_result = #{lreResult,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select file_id, user_id, file_name, lre_result, status, create_time from file_info
